form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: NOTICE TO BE GIVEN ORALLY IN SPANISH OR ENGLISH OR ANY OTHER LANGUAGE UNDERSTOOD BY THE DETAINEE., Exhibit A

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/5/2023 NOTICE TO BE GIVF ORALLY IN SPANISH OR ENG SH OR ANY OTHER LANGUAGE UNDERSTO s BY THE DETAINEE. You are being detained by the United States Immigration and Naturalization Service. I am handing you a written Notice that describes your rights. Please read this Notice carefully before deciding whether you wish to agree to be removed voluntarily from the United States, demand a deportation hearing, request political asylum, or apply for any other available form of relief. You must sign a copy of the Notice to show that you have received it. If you cannot read, please tell me and I will read the Notice to you. Exhibit A
